docs.title: WRO-FE 2025 Mindcraft
docs.text:
Welcome to the official documentation for the WRO-FE 2025 Mindcraft project.

  • Project repository: DexterTaha/WRO-FE-2025-Mindcraft
  • Docs repository: DexterTaha/WRO-FE-2025-Mindcraft-MkDocs-documentation

Use the left navigation to explore setup, hardware, software architecture, commands, algorithms, and more.

Tip: If you find issues or missing information, click “Edit this page” to propose changes directly.

docs.title: Algorithms
docs.text:
• Path planning / navigation
  • Object detection / classification
  • Control algorithms (PID, MPC, etc.)
  • Strategy logic

Include references to source files in the main repo.
